MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

Program_Info.Program_OS_Support: Linux,Mac OS X,Win7 x32,Win7 x64,WinVista,WinVista x64,WinXP

English.Keywords: Cryptography, Internet, Source code browsing, Open Source, Open Source Software, Development, Community, Source Code, Secure, Downloads, Free Software,HTML Encrypter, HTML, Encrypter, Stefan Cosma, Stefan, Cosma
English.Char_Desc_80: HTML Encrypter is designed as an accessible and easy-to-use encryption software.
English.Char_Desc_250: A tool designed as an accessible and easy-to-use encryption software.
English.Char_Desc_450: HTML Encrypter is an encryption and decryption application developed in Java. The application uses a number of algorithms to encrypt and decrypt the HTML source code
English.Char_Desc_2000: HTML Encrypter is an encryption and decryption application developed in Java. The application uses a number of algorithms to encrypt and decrypt the HTML source code: - Blowfish - AES - TEA - Rabbit - MARC 4 - Escape/Unescape functions In addition to the encryption and decryption functions, the application also returns the source code of a website. The user has the ability to upload the encrypted file, using the FTP transfer feature, to his or hers personal website. Additional features are listed below. One time encryption NEW Source code edit feature NEW Check for new app updates NEW Save user preferences NEW Undo/Redo functions NEW Search history Log file System tray Open URL
